players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we remain vigilant and work together to identify any suspicious behavior."
Diana: "I agree with Bob. Let's keep a close eye on each other and report any unusual behavior or inconsistencies we notice."
Charlie: "Let's work together to uncover the mafia. I will support any efforts to investigate and protect our team."

Diana: "I think we should consider the possibility that one of us might have unintentionally revealed some information during the daytime discussions. To ensure fairness and accuracy, I suggest we all share any suspicions or concerns we may have about each other's statements from Day 1."
Charlie: "I will support the investigation and be open to sharing any concerns I have. However, let's also ensure that we don't jump to conclusions without solid evidence."
